name: Introduction to Programming
description: Learn the basics of programming with this introductory course. Covers fundamentals of coding and problem-solving.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Explore advanced data structures and algorithms. Gain essential skills for software development.

name: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Become a full-stack web developer in this intensive bootcamp. Covers front-end and back-end development.

name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Dive into the world of machine learning. Learn about supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms.

name: Database Management Systems
description: Master the art of designing and managing databases. Essential for database administrators.

name: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Protect digital assets and networks from cyber threats. Learn about security best practices.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Create mobile apps for iOS and Android. Covers app design, development, and deployment.

name: Artificial Intelligence and Ethics
description: Explore the ethical considerations of AI. Discuss the impact of AI on society.

name: Software Engineering Capstone
description: Complete a real-world software project. Apply your skills and knowledge in a practical setting.
